This didn't work for me when i played it. It just was snow and i couldn't play what should i do
doesn't work for win7x64

It does work for win7x64 after all, but you got to run DSVideoConfig and in the video driver select the 3rd option, the one that has your video card and NOT TnL, and then open "Documents\Dungeon Siege\DungeonSiege.ini", copy the first line and paste it in "Documents\Dungeon Siege LOA\DungeonSiege.ini", in place of its first line. After this you are ready to go.
